author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
fixed issues in XmlCommand not working correctly for -First and -Skip
removed dead code form XmlCommand
added tests

I'll see if I can get some code coverage data

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4152

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
Finally successfully got updated code coverage numbers:

ConvertToXmlCommand 100%
ExportCliXmlCommand 100%
SelectXmlCommand 60.2% (the remainder are exception handling)

title: Add Test coverage for XmlCommand.cs
